leaf: Evaluate for medical versus surgical management. If hCG falls, follow until less than assay
paths: Evaluate patient for possible ectopic pregnancy -> Determine if the patient is stable or unstable -> Patient is stable -> Perform physical examination, transvaginal US, quantitative Î²-hCG, CBC, blood type and antibody screen, and serum progesterone level -> Check US results -> Pregnancy location not confirmed by US -> Check hCG and progesterone levels -> Low hCG and high progesterone -> Repeat hCG in 48 hr -> hCG increases by less than 50% -> Abnormal pregnancy: perform D&C -> Ectopic pregnancy confirmed -> Evaluate for medical versus surgical management. If hCG falls, follow until less than assay
